name: Avoid User-Exits with low comment/code ratio
description: ABAP user-exits should be documented. This reports shows all the ABAP user-exits with less than a defined comment / code ratio. This ratio is a parameter of the rule and can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each ABAP User-Exit with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The comment/code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact.
